metadata.inclusion:
1. Press and hold the inclusion/exclusion button for 1 second until LED turns on
2. Release the button to start inclusion for 15 seconds
3. LED blinks 3 times at 100ms intervals if inclusion is successful
metadata.exclusion:
1. Press and hold the inclusion/exclusion button for 1 second until LED turns on
2. Release the button to start exclusion
3. LED blinks 3 times at 100ms intervals if exclusion is successful
metadata.reset:
1. Press and hold the inclusion/exclusion button for 5 seconds until LED turns on and off
2. Release the button
3. Factory reset completes in 5 seconds with LED blinking 5 times at 100ms intervals
